name: Product Feature Video and Gallery
author: Mircode

sections.description:
VideoShop – Product Feature Video and Gallery – Add feature video to product shop page, category page, archive page and add feature video along with images on product single page. You can add feature video to any product and can add multiple video to make product video gallery at the product single page. You can also mix video and images combine as product gallery. With multiple Product Video you can Instantly transform your product single page into a fully Responsive video Carousel. This plugin will work with any WordPress theme. Shortcode is included for Elementor and Divi Builder. It is also supported variable product, so that if you add different image to each variation and on selecting that variation right image come up on viewport.

Plugin Features:

  • Add YouTube video as feature video to any product
  • You Can Add feature video along with feature image and gallery image
  • Support product variation image changing
  • Videos will show in the gallery if the product doesn’t have any image.
  • Adaptive video height based on single product image size
  • RTL support

Live demo Example:

Self Hosted Video shop/archive/category page
Vimeo Video shop/archive/category page
YouTube Video shop/archive/category page
Mixed Video shop/archive/category page
Variable product single page
Carousel Video Gallery product single page
Image Video mixed gallery product single page
Mixed Video shop/archive/category page

Download Premium License:

Premium Plugin Features:

  • 1 Time Purchase Lifetime Free Update
  • No yearly subscription, No future cost
  • Support YouTube, Vimeo And Self hosted Html5 Video(MP4, WebM, and Ogg)
  • Video Slider layout (Vertical or Horizontal) settings
  • Video Auto Play, Loop settings
  • Video Position settings (After Product Gallery Images, After Product Image and Before Product Gallery Images)
  • Video Display Settings (Display only videos on gallery)
  • Add custom video background
  • Video Shortcode [videoshop_shortcode] (For page builders like Divi Builder, Elementor Builder etc.)
  • Show video on shop page
  • Show video on product category page
  • Show video on product archive page

Download Premium License from Here:

Credits:

  • jQuery
  • woocommerce.com
  • YouTube Iframe API
  • Vimeo API
  • jQuery Fancybox
sections.faq:
Is free version support local self hosted video?

No. Pro version support Local self hosted video, Vimeo video and any video with embeded link.

Is free version support shop page feature video?

No. Free version only support product single page feature video.

How many websites can I use it?

You can use it in unlimited website.

1.0.2

  • Security update
  • Standard code practice update

1.0.1

  • Added shop page, archive and category page video support
  • Fixed variable product variation selected image come up on viewport

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
